testcase.name: Successful registration of new user with valid credential
testcase.system-out: Given User Launch Chrome Browser............................................passed When User opens URL "https://outlook.office.com/mail/"......................passed And User enters Email as "sender01togo@outlook.com" and click next..........passed And user enters Password as "Sender@4321" and click next....................passed Then Click on Signin........................................................passed

testcase.name: Composing mail with valid credential
testcase.system-out: Given User launch Chrome Browser............................................passed When User Opens URL "https://outlook.office.com/mail/"......................passed When User Enters Email as "sender01togo@outlook.com" and click next.........passed When user Enters Password as "Sender@4321" and click next...................passed And Click the Signin........................................................passed And User Click on New Message...............................................passed And Enter the mail..........................................................passed Then Click on send..........................................................passed
